definition: to chop/to cut down/to throw sth at sb
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
to regard decapitation as no more important than the wind blowing off your hat (idiom)
pinyin: kan3 tou2 bu4 guo4 feng1 chui1 mao4

sentences.english: Probably then they cut the skull for extracting the brain….
sentences.chinese: 也许他们当时是为了人脑才砍头。

sentences.english: A cockroach can live  several weeks with its head cut off--it dies from starvation.
sentences.chinese: 蟑螂在被砍头之后还能活几个星期，最后死也是饿死。

sentences.english: Hundreds of statues were beheaded and a number of bas-reliefs removed.
sentences.chinese: 数以百计的雕像被砍头，大批的浅浮雕被运走。

sentences.english: Great persecutors are recruited among martyrs whose heads haven't been cut off.
sentences.chinese: 那些没有被砍头的殉道者，招安成伟大的迫害者。

sentences.english: Great persecutors are recruited among martyrs whose heads haven’t been cut off.
sentences.chinese: 那些没有被砍头的殉道者，招安成伟大的迫害者。

sentences.english: When the Maoists determined that no deal was forthcoming, they beheaded the officer on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 当毛主义确定交易不可能实现时，便将这位警官砍头。

sentences.english: And he ordered the two favorites to be beheaded.
sentences.chinese: 于是两位爱妾被砍头了。

sentences.english: Or were you beheaded because you did evil to infringe upon the law?
sentences.chinese: 是作奸犯科，触犯了法律，因而被人砍头？

definition: to behead sb and display the head in public
the lingering death/the death of a thousand cuts (old form of capital punishment)
an execution/to put sb to death
to hang (i.e. execute by hanging)/to strangle
to execute by firing squad/same as 槍斃|枪毙
to parade (a prisoner) through the streets
to involve others (in a crime)/guilt by association
